Text:
Thanx, keeybee

"Stars: Gregory Peck, Joan Collins and Stephen Boy"

Joan Collins - Married approximately fourteen times - has taken her name from Tom,
- Tom Collins (gin, lemon juice, sugar and carbonated water.)
- Her sister, Jackie took her name from a book she wrote.

/In Beverly Hills gossip really makes a difference.
(Divergence`s - they're gents?)
